welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Pedro, Costa Rica! Get ready to fall in love with our charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Pedro has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
